prompt: A whimsical underwater scene in a vibrant coral reef. The focus is on a swarm of glowing jellyfish, each with bright, softly pulsating tentacles, floating gently through the water. Surrounding them are colorful corals, schools of small fish darting around, and beams of sunlight filtering through the water. The scene is rich with colors – pinks, blues, purples – showcasing the enchanting beauty of the underwater world. The jellyfish are curious and playful, adding a whimsical touch to the mystical environment.
